com.b2international.snowowl.datastore

Class BranchPathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.BranchPathUtils

  • public abstract class BranchPathUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for creating branch paths.

      • createPath

        public static IBranchPath createPath(IBranchPath branchPath,
                                     String segmentToAppend)
        Returns a new IBranchPath instance where the path has this instance's path and the specified segment concatenated. Multiple separators at the insertion point will be converted to a single separator.
        Parameters:
        segmentToAppend - the string segment to append to this path
        Returns:
        the resulting path

      • convertIntoBasePath

        public static IBranchPath convertIntoBasePath(IBranchPath logicalPath,
                                              IBranchPath contextPath)
        Converts the given branch path argument into a IBaseBranchPath instance.

        The branch path representing the MAIN branch is prohibited.

        Parameters:
        logicalPath - the branch path to convert. Cannot be the MAIN path.
        contextPath - the branch path to use for opening an index service.
        Returns:
        the converted branch path representing the base of a particular branch.

      • convertIntoBasePath

        public static IBranchPath convertIntoBasePath(IBranchPath logicalPath)

      • isBasePath

        public static boolean isBasePath(IBranchPath branchPath)
        Returns with true if the branch path argument is assignable to the IBaseBranchPath interface. Otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the branch path to check.
        Returns:
        true if base path. Otherwise false.

      • isMain

        public static boolean isMain(org.eclipse.emf.cdo.common.branch.CDOBranch branch)
        Returns true if the specified CDO branch is representing the MAIN branch.
        Parameters:
        branch - the CDO branch to check.
        Returns:
        true if the branch path is representing the MAIN, otherwise returns with false.

      • isMain

        public static boolean isMain(String path)
        Returns true if the specified branch path is the MAIN branch path.
        Parameters:
        path - the branch patch to check.
        Returns:
        true if the branch path is the MAIN, otherwise returns with false.

      • isMain

        public static boolean isMain(IBranchPath path)
        Returns with true if the specified branch path is the MAIN branch path.
        Parameters:
        path - the branch path to check whether this is the MAIN or not.
        Returns:
        true if the MAIN, otherwise returns with false.

      • topToBottomIterator

        public static Iterator<IBranchPath> topToBottomIterator(IBranchPath branchPath)
        Returns with a iterator of branch path for the given branch path argument.
        The iterator traverse the branch path parentage from top to down, hence the first item of the iterator is always the MAIN branch then its descendants.
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the branch path.
        Returns:
        an iterator for traversing the branch hierarchy from top to down.

      • bottomToTopIterator

        public static Iterator<IBranchPath> bottomToTopIterator(IBranchPath branchPath)
        Returns with a iterator of branch path for the given branch path argument.
        The iterator traverse the branch path parentage from bottom to top, hence the first item of the iterator is always the argument then its ancestors (if any) up to the IBranchPath.MAIN_BRANCH.
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the branch path.
        Returns:
        an iterator for traversing the branch hierarchy from bottom to top.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(String repositoryUUID,
                             String branchPath)
        Returns true if the branch with the path specified exists within the specified repository.
        Parameters:
        repositoryUUID -
        branchPath -
        Returns:
        true if the branch exists in the repository

        Parameters:
        repositoryUUID -
        Returns:
